lines.text: Soon she will be ready for the great moment when she and I will become one person; when my flesh will absorb hers. We will be one, one dual person. That will be the perfect combination of my work - the total fusion, the great moment.
As good a death as any. Does it matter how death takes you? Dead is dead.

[while fighting the invaders henchwomen]
Watch out for the gadgets on their chest!
It was too good for you! You! You men! Meaningless idiots! Fools! You could never comprehend! You will never comprehend! It is mine! Mine! Mine! And it will end with me! All of it! All of you!
I don't get it commander. Was it just two girls against you three men?
Proteo, Proteo wherefore art thou Proteo.
Why you! You helium-headed idiot you! You and your stupid rules, regulations and protocol!
Commander, you've gone over the line! For your own sake, I'm ordering you confined to quarters!

[disgusted]
How has the world survived people of your kind anyway?

[smirking]
Oh, I've been meaning to ask you dear, did you enjoy your vacation?
[last lines]
Mike Halstead, you're obnoxious! I can't stand you! You're unfair, unkind, uncouth, and I just, I just hate the sight of you!
[Mike shuts her up with a kiss]
A vital body indicates a vibrant spirit and mind.

[taken aback]
Oh yes, of course.
I would be enchanted to explore... your mind.
You can't go in there! You're not authorized personnel!
Oh, what a shame.
Besides, I don't have a key.

[slowly, as if to a three year old]
Oh, you don't have a key? We're magicians! Watch!
[Mike lasers door]
